imdb.plot outline: My hope with this series is that it will inspire people to follow their career dream. I want to show that with hard work, determination and dedication you can be whatever you want to be. I will be interviewing people that did follow their dream to show you that YOU CAN DO IT!
imdb.title: The 'You Can Do It!' Show
akas: The 'You Can Do It!' Show (United States)
plot: My hope with this series is that it will inspire people to follow their career dream. I want to show that with hard work, determination and dedication you can be whatever you want to be. I will be interviewing people that did follow their dream to show you that YOU CAN DO IT!
